name: Bubble Rush (itch) (BlueLuna)
description:
Oh Mr Bubble, you're frail and weak,
You're caught in a world of tricks and treat,
So help Mr Bubble escape his fate,
And fly away from this sorry state.

Oh Mr Bubble, it's not an easy start,
But you'll learn so fast with your good heart,
So push onward with your finger first,
But don't touch Mr Bubble, or he'll burst.

Oh Mr Bubble, be careful where you tread,
And stay away from sharp edges,
Use the wall to bounce yourself,
It's so easy you don't need no elves.

Oh Mr Bubble, the coins are good,
Collect them all and grow your loot,
They'll help make your journey smooth,
And kick those annoying ads in the tooth.

Your journey is fraught with many traps,
Some move, some stay and some can slap,
But they're all fun and exciting,
So go on and start playing.

Tons of fun are in this game,
Missing them is such a shame,
The key to win is not to rush,
Although the game is called BubbleRush.

BUBBLE RUSH IS AVAILABLE ON GOOGLE PLAY. 

Click the link below to download on GooglePlay.
